title: how long does it take for ban tier to go down
body: i got a 14 week ban over a year ago (lost email so dont have exact date) so im just curious if i do get one would it be permanent or has it decayed

replies.body: Elapsed time won't do so much to reduce your placement in the ladder, which isn't something visible.  You'd want to continue playing games as a stand up summoner without behavioral occurrences.  You can also reach out to our [PB Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) team in a ticket if you'd like more context specific to your account.
